column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////A Whiskey bar? oh yeah.  While the drinks are quite strong yet amazing. endless selection of whiskeys
column2: they even have Japanese whiskey. It was super packed on a Friday night
column3: and the hostess messed up our number but we got seated within 1 hr. I guess this is typical for houston Friday night.  Nevertheless
column4: the foods were a bit salty. the madeline were alright but the sweet/salty butter that comes with it was amazing. I also ordered the poutin
column5: not my favorite. and my friend didnt like her frog leg. One of my friend ordered the burger and she said it was amazing.
